synopsis.text:
Akemitsu Akagami, raised with the belief that no one can live alone, is determined to break free from his family's notorious legacy of being serial playboys. To avoid falling into the same trap, he keeps a safe distance from girls, until one fateful day when he finds himself inexplicably smitten. In a desperate attempt to suppress his newfound feelings, Akemitsu seeks refuge in a nearby temple, hoping to find solace in Buddhist teachings.

However, fate has other plans for him. The temple he chooses turns out to be a nunnery, filled with charming girls of all sorts, including the very girl who had stolen his heart. To make matters worse, he learns that his father had borrowed a significant amount of money from the nunnery and had fled without repaying it. Now, Akemitsu must work at the nunnery to repay the debt, all while trying to maintain his celibacy amidst a sea of beautiful women. Will he be able to resist temptation and uphold his vow, or will he succumb to the very desires he sought to escape? Join Akemitsu in this hilarious and heartwarming rom-com, as he navigates the unpredictable world of temple life.
